values:
Beautiful
Alluring
An angel come to earth
With a laugh that lifts your spirits
Brings sunshine through the fog
Anticipating your touch
Counting the seconds until I can kiss you
I fall asleep with thoughts of you
Your face inside my dreams
It was your voice on the wind
That woke me from sleep
With a smile brighter than the sun

It's gorgeous
Sitting, waiting
to be grasped by human hands
Untouched, undisturbed
glowing in all of its beauty
Soft and warm to the touch
quivering and inviting
The texture makes me want to
engulf
Resisting against the walls
of the moist, juicy
fruits protection.

Dark dreams are
Orgasmic freedom.
Come out of the shadows
Face me.
Shove, deep down,
ignoring.
Light dreams give
no hope.
Go back into the shadows.
Don't want to see you.
Turn.
Bring forth.
Confronting.

Awake

Walk now through my life with
thunderous steps
Admire the dark clouds surrounding you
For they will not be there for long
Stand before us, against a wall of
defiance
And he will aid in your destruction
Our words will pierce through the
lightening
you cannot win
Your fear sets in as the truth comes out
Unable to handle it
Set her free, go choose another
We are too strong
To defy us, is to Die

So much to say
No words to speak
Thoughts cluttered
Mind weak
Hope gone
Turn the page, say yes for once
Speak not of this termoil
I'm already filled with hatred
Living this way engulfs me with fear
Acceptance is not in me

If I look in your eyes,
would you turn away?
If I try to touch you,
would you step back?
If I hold you,
would you fight my embrace?
If I kiss you,
would you cry?
What if I love you?
Take this quiz at QuizGalaxy.com

The only thing that meant anything to me was taken away before I even had a fighting chance to try and save what we had.  I never told her how I felt.  Well that's not entirely true, I told her but the magnitude of my feelings was never properly expressed.  Saying I Love You has nothing to do with meaning it nor does it have anything to do with explaining your love.  Three words doesn't come close to letting her know that you want to spend the rest of your life with her.  I Love You doesn't cover enough ground.  You were my world and without you it feels like I don't exist.  Even after all this time, getting over you is not any easier than it was the day after, if not worse.  I never really understood what people meant when they say that they feel like they lost something.  I know that I've said those words before because if was as if they needed to be said; that's not the case.  Now I know.  Feeling incomplete is possible.  We all start our lives as one person, as one half of love and we spend the rest of our lives searching for our other half. The key is not letting go once you've found it.  Fighting for it.  Dieing for it.  I guess I'm not a fighter.  Or I'm just afraid since I've lost you twice, trying to make you realize you'll never have to be half again could make it hurt even more.  If you said no, it would be as though I've lost you a third time.  Instead I battle everyday just to sirvive without you.  I should have told you what you meant to me.  I was scared of losing you, now I"m terrified to try to win you back.  I know deep down that it will never happen again for me, at least not with you.

You're an Expert Kisser
You're a kissing pro, but it's all about quality and not quantity You've perfected your kissing technique and can knock anyone's socks off And you're adaptable, giving each partner what they crave When it comes down to it, your kisses are truly unforgettable
What Kind of Kisser Are You?

I thought of you again
The third time today
Each time I do it gets a little harder
Accepting that I can't have you
I talked to you once today
The second time this week
Each time I do it brightens up my day
More than I thought it could
I saw you for a bit today
The first time this month

Can't live like this
Always running in circles
Realizing you'll never be mine but
Loving you with all my heart
Above and beyond the limits of my soul.

Your Power Color Is Lime Green
At Your Highest: You are adventurous, witty, and a visionary. At Your Lowest: You feel misunderstood, like you don't fit in. In Love: You have a tough exterior, but can be very dedicated. How You're Attractive: Your self-awareness and confidence lights up a room. Your Eternal Question: "What else do I need in my life?"
What's Your Power Color?

I scream your name into the night sky
As I have a thousand times before
The stars staring back at me
Hurt
As then do every night 
Just within my grasp but
Barely out of my reach
Need 
As you have been a thousand times before
Reaching out to hold you
Knowing that I can't
Pain
Aches my heart like the thousand times before
I want to lift you to the heavens
Walk with you through hell
Never
Love you like I have a thousand times before.

You will go to jail for:
Setting off cherry bombs on the roof of your school while yelling death to tyranny!

You scored 7 Honor, 5 Justice, 4 Adventure, and 7 Individuality!
You are as quiet as the wind, deadly as a viper and you follow no master. You are a Rogue Ninja. Let no one say you are without honor, lest they meet a quiet and questionable end.

Dress as you like and keep your knives close. You'll do just fine

You scored higher than 39% on Ninjinuity

Don't judge me when all you have to compare my to is your own life.  When you know nothing else, it's not your decision to make or your business to get involved in anything.  Understand and correct the errors in your own life before trying to talk to others about theirs.  Maybe your just scared.  Maybe your life scares you so much you have to live your happiness vicariously through other people.  Sad.  What happens when you go home at night.  When all you have to dream about are the things that other people have done.  Do you sit alone and cry for everybody else.  I did not ask for your input.  Why do you feel the need to give it.  Nobody is perfect,. and we all need to fix, or accept and adjust to our own lives before we help people with theirs.  Our lives all intertwine, we don't deny this.  However, unless our own direct actions will help somebody else's life, it should be up to them to resolve whatever issues their going through.  Asking for somebody's help with emotional issues, is in all reality pointless.  All they do is let you sit there and go over possible causes of action and then decide on your own which one would be best for you.  At most they give you an angle that you just didn't see before.  Ultimatey, one will chose their own path whether or not they think they got help from outside sources.  Asking for somebody's advice and then taking it is simply justifying a direction that you were to cowardly to chose on your own.  It makes you feel better about your choice when you think that somebody else gave it to you, or you think it makes somebody else feel important by letting them think that they actually helped you come to a decision that will affect you rlife.  NOT THEIR PLACE TO DO SO.  Everybody has the means and the drive to change their own life.  All it takes is to sit down for half an hour and think about everything that's making you uncertain.  Maybe you'll end up burning a bridge or two, but others will be built along the way.  Don't think about what others think, or about hurting somebody else's feelings, they will get over that.  But if it's going to make you happy, then it doesn't matter what others think.  Your friends will be ther for you, and if they aren't or don't support you in whatever you chose to do, then you need to think about how good of a friend they are in the first place.  If they try to interject with what they think you should do, then maybe they just want you to do what's best and are simply offering suggestions.  Listen to them, but only listen, and then come to your own conclusions.  They will stand beside you. I have made my own decisions throughout my life, and I've also done what others think.  The one's I don't regret, are the ones I've made on my own.  So don't judge me when all you have to compare my lfie to is your own.  Worry about your's first and then you still won't have the right to judge anybody else.

Before I even knew you
My heart longed to love you
Before I ever kissed you
My lips ached to taste you
Before I ever touched you
My arms desired to hold you
The woman of my dreams
Her image that I'd dream of
Became real when you walked into my life
Now that I've held you
I never want to let go
Now that I've kissed you 
I never want to stop
Now that you're in my dreams
The shadow's cannot follow
Before I even knew you
My heart longed to love you.

As every smile comes over 
your lips the fire you've
ignited in me continues to
grow, removing all the shadows that
blanket my dreams
bringing the edges of the
earth closer to my finger tips.
Each time you reach for me
your touch slows time to
let my soul play in the
heavens and look down on
you with a love that 
eases all pain and doubt.

You stand in front of me
scrapping your fingers
across my heart and I'm letting you
All my emotions are in your hands,
and I don't want them back,
only you can't handle this
Let me through your gateway and
I'll never leave
But you're still laying me down
gently onto a bed of nails
you don't see
Your eyes are shut to the 
power you have, and the
pain you're causing
Lift your head, open your eyes
just wake, and pull me from this
dungeon.

Lies
Your life is your life 
and nobody else matters.
The centre of your universe
is nothing more than
unfelt words and hidden meanings.
I didn't matter.
To you my life, my love was just another trophy
in the book of false
truths and heartless 
feelings you carry with you.
It is you.
I meant nothing.
Your desire, your truthful
words unspoken to me, while
my heart and emotions were
wasted on you,
and yours were never within
my reach.

I caught the lightning 
forked from your words
and held it to my heart.
Each heartbeat now
pumping you through my veins.
Your voice has embedded 
you image permanently into 
my soul.
thank you

The street echoes with the sonds of childres laughter
Long shadows of the buildings sweep over the playground.
The still swingset creaks with each blow of the cool breeze.
A fence is all that can be seen of the weedfilled baseball diamond.
The snow falls, covering the park in cold powder,
As the wind howls and wisks away the Childless Joy.

Bleed
The life force that binds us all
Can no longer be contained with you
My cold sweat drips as I wake from slumber
Next to the burning candles
I sit breathing hard as I stare into the shadows
with your voice on the wind that rustles the curtains
And the room goes dark
I lay once more to be with you again.

Rising over mountains
Hands outstretched to touch yours.
This terrible cycle
Keeps you but inches away.
Never to walk hand-in-hand,
But always facing each other.
An eternity of torment,
Of constantly reaching for you.
Happiness, I will not know.
So I must continue with the
Heartbreak of this watchful eye
As you orbit around my heart
But touch it not.

The way you treat me
Tells me that you care.
The light within my soul 
You have put there
My heart is more alive
When you are near
The darkness has warmth
Now that you are here.

Can't wait to hold you
Can't wait to touch you
As the seconds tick my life away
Can't wait to see you
Can't wait to hear you
Minute by minute losing myself
Can't wait to be with you
Can't wait....
              forever.

Tears flow simultaneous 
to your chills
My voice muffled by
Your sobs, as I speak 
softly, slowly,
Crushing you with every word.
It - will - be - okay 
But not the same
Your love seeping out
Your eyes, dripping to your feet
Taking my heart with it
Knowing my one mistake
is crumbling my world.

I lift my head
Breathe the stale dark air
Encased in shadow,
Hidden from all
Dark clouds line the sky
Your reflection in my eyes
Is all I have left
And i stand 
Calling for your return with
Your taste frozen on my lips
Forever lost in an eternity of lifelessness.

Tears flow like water
Residue of joyful nights
Silence haunting my soul,
I'm freed from this entrapment
Condemned to this freedom
Whisper my name or
Scream your goodbyes
Alone we remain,
Together.

My back's against the wall
Let you go to watch you fall
I laugh at your dismay
The fucked up life that you portray
Worn on my head, your life, my crown
for every one smile, 
I've made you frown
All your life you thought
you were dreaming
But I kept you from
eternally screaming.

Across the field 
awaits the demons
of your past, with
eyes that penetrate your every being.
The hand of guilt 
ushering you forward,
burning your feet of the
fiery air above you.
Let go or never return.

Experiences condemned to be
forgotten words lost on
unfeeling emotions caught between us and
nothing else matters to you except 
pain brings out the worst in
you think the world revolves around me.

I am your
unwanted future.
Holding memories 
of our unloved past.
Your soul is mine,
Your happiness non-existent.
Fork your tongue with
unspoken words.
Stay silent,
as tears drip over
your dirt covered face.
Below me, 
Below us, 
forever.

Falling over the edge of the flat world
you've created with unfelt hope and thoughts
of a non-existent love.
Our foundation is crumbling with the weight of your lies.
Your heart, slipping out of my hands so I may grasp mine again.

Looking up at you
always
Your wings letting you hover above me
In a world I'm eternally thankful to be a part of
Looking in awe at the beauty that surrounds you
wondering why I'm allowed to be here.

Blood dripping down your back
Old wounds re-opening
Your flesh turning to a faint blue
This is it, if only you knew.

Life draining from your body
Your muscles going limp
His grip tightens 'round your throat
your body falls, your soul does float.

Lying there motionless
Blood still draining from you
Slowly starts to release his hold
And there you are, lifeless and cold.

As I stare into your eyes in the picture on my desk you seem to float above the tears my heart have shed for every time I've said goodbye and watched you walk away until the next time your smile lifts my soul to dance among the clouds that hover over the love I hide as my thoughts drift to you once more awaiting the day I can pull myself to the pedestal I hold you on and hand you my heart hoping that you'll take it and place i on the seat beside you before I give up hope and lose the chance to love you forever.

Her eyes encapsulate the heart as your soul dances around the stars that spell her name through your dreams leaving her face imprinted in your vision overshadowing the reality of trying to live without her unable to fill the void where her kiss was held so dear to your heart attempting in vain to un-do the past and be relieved of the hurt and regret that you brought upon yourself close your eyes and let the tears paint the memories of the love you foolishly cast aside.  That's all you have left.

I see your face amidst the stars that carry me through my dreams.
Fighting the waking sun to stay here
But anxious to hold you
I wake from sleep with your arm still wrapped around me
I never left your side
Lay still, don't wake to greet the day
I don't want this to be over.

Stabbed by your deceit
My heart shed a tear
She'll take your knife from my back
With only a kiss
And close the wound from you forever
I hope it's worth it
And that you never look back
Because I've left and forgotten already.

Well my car left me stranded in Hamilton on Sunday, if you didn't know that already.  It cost me $100 to get a tow to Petro from C.A.A which could have been a lot worse but it still sucks.  What sucks even more, is the fact that my dad has the platinum card with C.A.A which gives him up to 200km for free towing, and he was in Hamilton on sunday, and I couldn't get a hold of him. (at the time I didn't know that he had that card, or I would have waited until he got home and had him come to get me, but that's neither here nor there)  So I thought that it was the fuel pump that was broken, since when I looked under the hood there was no fuel being sprayed out of the injector.  It ended up only being a broken crank sensor, which ended up being a lot cheaper to fix that what I orignally thought.  So now my car works again, and it's up to the car on how long it wants to work for now.

But, tomorrow, myself Alex and Kyle (a guy from my class) are going to the Toronto Rock lacross game, so that should be fun.  I just hope that Alex and I can stand being around the guy for that long.  He isn't a bad guy, but he can get very annoying very quickly (and I can't get angry with him, because it's his A.D.D that does it)  But it should be okay.  I'm really excited to see them play, since i've never been to a Rock game before.  

I have so much more to post, (or tell people) but I'm at school right now, and have to head back to class.
Didn't mean to undate the same thing twice.  I didn't realize that I've already put it on here.  Sorry.

For our clashing minds
Existence is futile
Pluck your wilted rose from my bed of thorns
and be gone
Just follow your tears down 
The fiery canvas you've painted and realize
Our friendship was for not
You're still living in an abandonded dream
I've already awakened to watch the
Candle drip its final breath

My car started to make weird noises just before my journey to Ottawa last weekend.  At first it sounded like a vacuum leak from my brake booster, then it started squealing when I applied the brake.  Then, it started squealing without me pressing the brake.  Now, it just does any of the three at any given time.  I'm taking it in tomorrow to get fixed, and I fear it might cost a large amount to fix it.  

If anybody doesnt' know what I just said in terms of terminology and wants to know, just ask me.

As much as I've tried to convince myself, and others, that I'm okay I have to admit that I'm not.  Not even close.  It doesn't matter what I'm doing, where I am or what I say to get my mind elsewhere, it always just drifts back to the same thoughts.  I probably shouldn't be posting this since it won't make it any easier, but honestly....what will?  

I just keep hoping to hear 'i miss you' regardless of how farfetched that hope actually is.  

We are talking and started hanging out again which is good and I don't want this post to change that, because we do get along great, I just needed to say a few things.
